text:
I can help you with that! Do you need help with:


  • Turning on my hotspot - Apple device
  • Turning on my hotspot - Andriod device
  • Seeing if my line has the option
  • Troubleshooting my device

setParameterActions.value: Turning on my hotspot - Apple device

transitionRoutes.targetPage: Turning on my hotspot - Apple device
transitionRoutes.name: 16bea6f4-fa50-46ad-bd78-8f54c0c8d737

setParameterActions.value: Turning on my hotspot - Android device

transitionRoutes.targetPage: Turning on my hotspot - Android device

transitionRoutes.condition: $session.params.userinput = "Seeing if my line has the option"

setParameterActions.parameter: Parameters are values extracted from the end user during the conversation. Learn more userinput Display name * Can contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes. Must start with a letter. Select available system(opens in a new tab) or custom(opens in a new tab) entity type.
setParameterActions.value: Seeing if my line has the option

transitionRoutes.targetPage: Seeing if my line has the option
transitionRoutes.name: 295f93eb-b3ab-41bd-9872-4cd1b6a51fe4
